reviews.review: indirim devam ederken alın kaçırmayın... eski omasına rağmen oynaması zevkli ... cs go da kasma fps sorunu yaşayan bu oyuna yönelsin fps düşmüyor cs source de   ; )

Игра в сто раз лучше последней части,классика в которую играют чуть ли не столетиями,разнообразное количество карт,режимы зомби,тюрьмы и прочей шляпы в которой стоит засесть и не выйдешь.Конкретней говоря если рассматривать по скидону,особенно на черную пятницу за 51 рубль считаю. как оскорблением к старой школе если ты еще не взял.
This is a very fun game, however I believe the sequel, CS:GO is better.

un classique qu'on ne présente plus. je conseille pour les nostalgiques ou les curieux voulant voir le grand frère de csgo.

I wish I could go back in time and play this game for the first time again. The memories are just countless...
Truly one of the best games. Loved it since the beginning <3

One of my favorite games.

Even though servers are not populated, you can still have a fun time when people ARE playing on a server.
Also fun with friends as well.

i bought this game out of curiosity to compare it with csgo. as soon as I started playing with it I felt a sense of lightness never felt with csgo. unlike csgo the players are very nice and I managed to make friends with inhuman ease. I think I found my game. thanks Valve.
